titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Frank Angell papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Loralee Sepsey

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-01-09T13:01-0800
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.abstract: Writings, correspondence, notes, statistics, printed matter, personal documents, photographs, and memorabilia, relating to the work of the Commission for Relief in Belgium, the Comité National de Secours et d'Alimentation, and Frank Angell's involvement with both organizations. Materials document the relief work done in Belgium during World War I and its German occupation and Belgian unemployment relief before and during the war. Used as research material for the study by Angell, "The Belgians under the German Occupation," which is included in the collection.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Frank Angell papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1980.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Graduated from the University of Vermont
Worked as English teacher to Chinese legation in Washington, D.C.
Worked as a physics teacher in a Washington, D.C. high school
Went to Germany to do graduate work in physics, met psychologist Wilhelm Wundt, and switched field to psychology
Graduated from Wundt's laboratory at the University of Leipzig with Ph.D. in psychology
Worked as Assistant Professor of Psychology at Cornell University
Became Professor and Executive Head of the Department of Psychology at Stanford University
Associate Editor of the American Journal of Psychology
Worked for the Commission for Relief in Belgium and did relief work in Belgium
Awarded the honor of Chevalier de l'Ordre de la Couronne by the King of Belgium
Retired from Stanford University as Professor Emeritus
Associate editor of the Journal of General Psychology

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Writings, correspondence, notes, statistics, printed matter, personal documents, photographs, and memorabilia relating to the work of the Commission for Relief in Belgium, the Comité National de Secours et d'Alimentation, and Frank Angell's involvement with both organizations. Materials document the relief work done in Belgium during World War I and its German occupation and Belgian unemployment relief before and during the war. Used as research material for the study by Angell, "The Belgians Under the German Occupation;" and the collection includes the typescript of the study.

controlaccess.corpname: Comité national de secours et d'alimentation (Brussels)
controlaccess.subject: International relief.
Unemployed--Belgium.
World War, 1914-1918--Belgium.
World War, 1914-1918--Civilian relief.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes travel documents such as a passport, identification letter from Herbert Hoover, a travel permit from the German government, and a napkin.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes notes, letters from provincial relief committees and the Commission for Relief in Belgium, and other personal correspondence to Frank Angell.

did.unittitle: Commission for Relief in Belgium File,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Membership lists, circulars, a blank donation card, and letters of appreciation from the Pope and Archbishop.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Personal correspondence and a life certificate for Marie Louise Marcy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Personal notes, reports, drafts, and other writings by Frank Angell on unemployment, conditions, statistics, relief distributions, and other relief related issues during his time in Belgium that are unrelated to his study "Belgians Under German Occupation."

did.unittitle: "Belgians Under German Occupation," File, Part I,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Appendices, reports, essays, and other writings containing information on clothing relief, discreet assistance, shelter, unemployment, and other forms of aid used in "Belgians Under German Occupation."

did.unittitle: "Belgians Under German Occupation," File, Part II,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Drafts, reports, and other writings related to clothing relief, workhouses, relief categories, and other topics relating to aid used in "Belgians Under German Occupation."

did.unittitle: "Belgians Under German Occupation," File, Part III,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Table of contents and pages 1 through 90.

did.unittitle: "Belgians Under German Occupation," File, Part IV,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A third appendix and pages 91-183.

did.unittitle: Comité National de Secours et d'Alimentation File,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Worksheets and forms used to construct a family profile, determine amount of goods and level of unemployment, and determine amount of relief received. Specific to each Belgian province or large municipality.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Circulars to provincial and local committees on changes in policy and relief guidelines, correspondence between chairmen, pamphlets, reports, and specific instructions and dispatches from Comité de Secours et d'Alimentation and its national, provincial, and local branches. Topics include unemployment, disability, wage and rent prices, military families, pay periods, and public utility relief.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Reports dealing with unemployment issued by the subcomittees Aide et Protection aux Chomeurs and Aide et Protection aux Sans-Travail Necessiteux.

did.unittitle: Partial employment forms and claims File,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Certificates, forms, and worksheets used by the committee to determine eligibility for relief, partial employment, relief amounts, and steady employment.

did.unittitle: Family profiles and declaration of goods File,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Booklets, pamphlets, reports, circulars, and informational materials from certain local/provincial committees and interest groups, such as Federation Socialiste Societes de Secours Mutuels du Bassin de Charleroi and Metalworkers. Topics include new relief guidelines and distribution, record keeping, alcoholic drink tender, unemployment, and finances.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Lists of relief recipients, charts to determine amounts of relief, expense reports, record keeping logs for relief recipients and unemployement, and other forms of reference and record keeping.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes relief resources used by Belgian citizens, such as identification cards, identification books, relief tickets, certificates to receive aid, and statements of merchandise. All belong to one city or province.

did.unittitle: Comité National de Secours et Alimentation/Assistance Discrète File,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Letters from petitioners seeking private aid from a benefactor to the Director/President; senders' names blacked out.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Report describing "secours A" and photographs of women returning from/going to market.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Comporised of wholly unemployed/partially unemployed statistics for specific provinces.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Charts of unemployment statistics for each province, numbers of children of unemployed, amounts of aid distributed by each province, and statistics for the Consultations de Nourrissons

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Reports on various medical issues concerning Belgium, mainly tuberculosis and the distribution of aid and relief to combat the disease.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains photographs, rations calculations based on calories and costs, expense reports for weekly provisions/consumption of a certain family, and menus of meals provided to a certain family.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Reports and photographs of clothing workhouses, a label for workhouse shipments, and a program of lectures given to their employees.

did.unittitle: Expense reports and order forms File,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Expense reports, order forms, inventory logs, distribution forms, and price listings for materials and already produced clothes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Photographs of homes, floor plans, general reports, maps of destroyed homes, expense reports, construction reports, lists of subsidies by province, construction budgets by province, and order forms relating to housing relief and the rebuilding of destroyed homes in Belgium.

unittitle.title: Habitations provisoires dans la Province d'Anvers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, worksheets, certificates, receipts, and statements for those who were disabled in the war or lost their main source of income due to the war.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Reports and statistics on bread lines, soup distribution, and other issues pertaining to children and orphans in various provinces.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Reports on medical services and the general status of children and orphans in Antwerp.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Questionnaires, order forms, and worksheets for child relief and orphans, reports on orphanages, and reports on the activities of committees to aid children and orphans.

did.unittitle: Cantines Maternelles and Consultation de Nourrissons Subject File,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Reports, flyers, and photographs that related to the relief organizations Cantines Maternelles and Consultations de Nourrissons, which both dealt with feeding and taking care of children/mothers/families.
